subject: Horse Racing

Medicine and Health
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Horses
lead_paragraph: Like most jockeys who ride at Aqueduct during the grim winter months, Chuck Lopez has goals, but they are modest ones: He wants to make some money and avoid getting hurt.
snippet: Like most jockeys who ride at Aqueduct during the grim winter months, Chuck Lopez has goals, but they are modest ones: He wants to make some money and avoid getting hurt.
